message.body: Just said another prayer for you. I hope you are feeling stronger today I love you so much.
I'm thinking about. I'm very sorry.
I am praying that God gives you strength to feel better each day.
It's okay there's nothing we can do
When the vassar financial aid info arrives by snail mail can we open it and let u know what the offer is?
If u prefer that we not I understand
Yes that's fine. Tell mom I'm feeling better and am seriously considering mcgill
I'm so glad you are feeling better. We love you very much. Enjoy the rest of your stay in Italy. Big hug and kiss.
You should listen to the new Justin Timberlake album it's INCREDIBLE. Also got into NYU
Thanks for the news re nyu. message. I will check out j t enjoy Italy. I love you.
Still thinking about you with much love. I'm very proud of you in so many ways. That you are in Italy now reminds me of how wonderful you were in Norway. You are at home in this wide world.
I love you and mom very much and am so excited to see you again. Thank you for everything.
Vassar financial aid letter didn't arrive yet. Probly tomorrow. Ill also call mcgill tomorrow re financial aid. Great photo of you all at San Giovanni Battista. Much love.
Did u want to go to the vassar weekend sat apr 13 thru mon 15th? If so I need to reserve immediately.
The prospective students weekend?
Yes
Yep sounds good
Ok. We can't wait to see you tomorrow. Enjoy the beach. Love.
Just kidding I can't go because I'm busy that weekend
Just kidding I CAN GO
Ok. Ha ha. Love. Financial info didn't arrive today ill call McGill to find out about that today.
We are looking forward to seeing you. Can you text us when your bus passes by the Philly airport? Much love.
We're 20 minutes away
Yeah
I love you!
Love you too!
